description: This has a delicious orange tang, great on its own or served with thickened cream
keywords: Cake,Pescatarian,Orange,Halal,Seafood free,Soy free,Vegetarian,Tree nut free,Sesame free,Peanut free
name: Orange cake Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 eggs, whisked (prior to adding to ingredients)
0.25 cup milk (or omit this and add two tablespoons of greek yoghurt)
0.25 cup orange juice (if using greek yoghurt instead of milk, make this around 1/2 cup)

recipeInstructions.text: Combine all cake ingredients and beat thoroughly for 3 minutes.
Pour mixture into a greased or lined 20cm x 10cm loaf or 20cm round or ring tin.
Bake in the centre of a 180C oven for 35-45 minutes. Test with skewer at around 35 mins to see if it's cooked.
Let it sit in the pan for 10 mins to cool off slightly then turn onto a wire rack and allow to cool.
Sift icing sugar into a bowl and slowly add the orange juice, stirring until you get the consistency you want. You might not use all the juice, just add what is needed for a not too runny icing.
Sprinkle the orange rind on top.
